meanings.definition: Showing a belief that stock prices will fall.
meanings.sent1: She felt bearish about investing in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: Investors became bearish as the market showed signs of decline.
meanings.sent3: The bearish forecast made her rethink her investment strategy.
meanings.sent4: His bearish predictions turned out to be accurate.
meanings.sent5: The bearish outlook painted a gloomy picture for the economy.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or relating to a bear or bears.
meanings.sent1: The bearish features of the toy reminded her of a real bear.
meanings.sent2: The bearish costume at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent3: The bearish mascot danced around, entertaining the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The bearish figurine looked cute and cuddly.
meanings.sent5: The bearish design on the shirt was adorable.
